name: Floyd County Shelter
description: Homeless shelter providing emergency housing and support services to individuals and families in Floyd County, Kentucky. Also known as Maddiwar House of Hope (formerly East KY House of Hope). Offers 24/7 emergency shelter, case management, and assistance with finding permanent housing. Operates through generous community support and donations. Mission is to help homeless individuals become self-sufficient and find stable housing.
source: Verified from official website and multiple online sources
services: Emergency shelter, case management, housing assistance, support services
eligibility: Homeless individuals and families in Floyd County area
notes: Formerly known as East KY House of Hope, renamed to Maddiwar House of Hope in recognition of the Maddiwar family's generous donation. Provides 24/7 emergency shelter services.
